commitment.description: At Aramco, we are dedicated to delivering innovative and sustainable plastic manufacturing solutions that meet global standards of quality and performance.

list.title: Quality Assurance

list.title: Long-term Partnership

story.heading: Our Story
story.subTitle: A journey of innovation, excellence, and unwavering commitment to quality
story.par: True success begins with product excellence — but it doesn't end there. We continuously evolve through global manufacturing standards, innovation, and strategic investments in state-of-the-art technology.
story.paragraph_1: Aramco Trading & Industry was founded in 2015 by Mr. Osama Hosni, and has rapidly established itself as one of the leading masterbatch manufacturers in Egypt and the Middle East.
story.par2: From the very beginning, our company has been driven by a bold vision: to deliver high-quality, reliable, and innovative masterbatch solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of local and international markets. What started as a small operation has grown into a fully integrated industrial powerhouse — thanks to our ongoing commitment to global manufacturing standards, continuous process improvements, and significant investments in state-of-the-art production technology.
story.par3: At Aramco, we believe that true success begins with product excellence — but it doesn’t end there. We work closely with our clients to provide customized solutions across various industries that rely on masterbatch, including plastics, packaging, household goods, and more. Our expert team also offers technical support and production consulting to ensure optimal performance within our clients’ manufacturing environments.
story.par4: Environmental sustainability is at the heart of our operations. We are committed to eco-friendly practices across all stages of production, minimizing waste, optimizing energy use, and incorporating safe and recyclable raw materials whenever possible.
story.par5: We don’t just supply materials — we aim to be true success partners for our customers, standing beside them as they innovate, grow, and lead in their respective markets.

missionVision.heading: Mission & Vision
missionVision.description: Our success is driven by our commitment to excellence and innovation in Aramco .

cards.title: At Aramco Trading & Industry
cards.description: At Aramco Trading & Industry, we are dedicated to delivering high-quality masterbatch products with a strong focus on innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. We achieve this by utilizing the latest manufacturing technologies and providing exceptional after-sales support, ensuring long-term value and reliability for our clients across various industries.

cards.title: Sustainable Masterbatch Innovation
cards.description: To become a leading force in delivering innovative and sustainable raw material solutions — particularly in masterbatch — for the plastics industry, contributing to the progress of global industries and the enhancement of quality of life.

values.heading: Our Core Values
values.description: At Aramco, our core values guide everything we do. We are committed to excellence, quality, innovation, and sustainability in every project, ensuring we deliver high-quality solutions while fostering long-term partnerships with our clients and stakeholders.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We uphold the highest standards of quality at every stage of production to ensure reliable and consistent results.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We promote responsible environmental practices to preserve resources and minimize our ecological footprint.

partnership.description: We believe in growing with our clients, fostering long-term relationships built on trust and collaboration.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We deliver on our promises with dependable products and services that our customers can trust every time.

browse.heading: Our Product
browse.subheading: Explore our comprehensive range of masterbatch solutions designed for excellence in plastic manufacturing.
browse.disFilter: Filler masterbatch is widely used in the production of plastic products. It consists of a blend of calcium carbonate (CaCO₃), plastic resin pellets, and specialized additives tailored to meet customer requirements
browse.colorDisF: Color masterbatch is a plastic compound used to impart vibrant, accurate, and consistent coloration to plastic products. It is made by blending high-quality pigments with a base resin and special additives.
browse.customDis: Custom masterbatch is a tailor-made formulation developed to meet your exact product requirements — whether it's color, performance, or special functionality. At Aramco.

hero.title: Filler Masterbatch
hero.description: Filler masterbatch is widely used in the production of plastic products. It consists of a blend of calcium carbonate (CaCO₃), plastic resin pellets, and specialized additives tailored to meet customer requirements.

advantages.title: Advantages of Aramco Filler Masterbatch
advantages.description: Our filler masterbatch offers several key benefits that transform your production efficiency and product quality

list.title: Cost Reduction
list.description: Lowers raw material consumption, thus reducing production costs significantly

list.title: Enhanced Product Properties
list.description: Improves hardness, impact resistance, and product stability

list.title: Processing Efficiency
list.description: Stabilizes production processes and enhances surface quality

list.title: Energy Savings
list.description: High thermal conductivity of calcium carbonate reduces energy consumption

filler_page.products_description: Comprehensive range of filler masterbatch solutions designed to meet diverse manufacturing requirements
filler_page.applications_description: Aramco's filler masterbatch is widely applied in various manufacturing processes
filler_page.why_description: Leading provider of innovative filler masterbatch solutions

why_items.title: Innovation Excellence
why_items.description: High-quality solutions engineered with cutting-edge technology and innovative formulations

why_items.title: Customer Focus
why_items.description: Specialized additives tailored to meet diverse customer needs and specific requirements

why_items.title: Cost Efficiency
why_items.description: Ensuring cost efficiency and production excellence throughout your manufacturing process

hero.title: Color
hero.description: Premium plastic compound engineered to deliver vibrant, accurate, and consistent coloration to your plastic products. Made by blending high-quality pigments with base resin and special additives for superior performance.

whatIs.title: What is Color Masterbatch?
whatIs.description: Color masterbatch is a plastic compound used to impart vibrant, accurate, and consistent coloration to plastic products. It is made by blending high-quality pigments with a base resin and special additives, then pelletized for use in various manufacturing processes.

features.title: Key Features of Aramco Color Masterbatch
features.subtitle: Engineered with advanced technology to deliver exceptional performance in every application

dispersion.title: Excellent Pigment Dispersion
dispersion.description: Ensures uniform color distribution and consistency across the final product surface.

fastness.title: High Color Fastness
fastness.description: Maintains color integrity under harsh processing conditions and long-term usage.

thermal.title: Thermal Resistance
thermal.description: Performs reliably at high processing temperatures without degradation or color shift.

dust.title: Reduced Dust and Contamination
dust.description: Minimizes airborne particles and workplace pollution compared to traditional powdered pigments.

efficiency.title: Enhanced Production Efficiency
efficiency.description: Improves workflow by making handling easier, reducing waste, and cutting overall production costs.

colors.title: Available Colors
colors.subtitle: Comprehensive color palette to meet all your design requirements

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.description: Tailored color masterbatch with special visual effects based on your product's design requirements. We work closely with you to create unique colors that perfectly match your brand identity and product specifications.

applications.title: Applications
applications.subtitle: Ideal for a wide range of plastic processing applications

whyChoose.subtitle: As a trusted partner in the plastics industry, Aramco delivers comprehensive solutions that drive success

hero.title: Custom
hero.description: Tailor-made formulations developed to meet your exact product requirements — whether it's color, performance, or special functionality. We don't just sell products — we collaborate with you to design precise, effective, and application-specific solutions.

whatIs.title: What is Custom Masterbatch?
whatIs.description: Custom masterbatch is a tailor-made formulation developed to meet your exact product requirements — whether it's color, performance, or special functionality.
whatIs.highlight: At Aramco, we don't just sell products — we collaborate with you to design precise, effective, and application-specific masterbatch solutions.

features.title: Key Features of Aramco's Custom Masterbatch
features.subtitle: Comprehensive capabilities designed to bring your vision to life

formulations.title: Fully Customized Formulations
formulations.description: We create masterbatch from scratch to meet your technical and aesthetic needs.

colors.title: Unlimited Color Options
colors.description: Accurate color matching based on RAL, Pantone, or actual customer samples.

functionalities.title: Added Functionalities
functionalities.description: Integrate features like UV resistance, flame retardants, antioxidants, and more.

testing.title: Advanced Laboratory Testing
testing.description: Each formulation is thoroughly tested to ensure full compatibility with your base resin and processing conditions.

support.title: Technical Support at Every Step
support.description: Our experts work closely with your production team to ensure seamless performance and implementation.
